author: dlr
msg: o Use JVM-specified defaults when reading in default language and
country from the configuration file (rather than hard-coding our
o Attempt to guess the name of a missing resource bundle using locale
defaults when client sent only a language (and not a country) in their
HTTP Accept-Header.  This behavior was observed in certain
configurations of Netscape 4.7x, but could apply to any browser.
